::Astral/Recklessa::

Astral dives out of the way again, cursing when he falls to the 
ground. He begins to get to his feet.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recklessa fires two more missiles down at Motormaster.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> All the firepower hit the hull of the truck while its starts 
turning itself
> towards its missed targets, severely scratching up the paint of the
> trailer. "Damn mechonats, Get off my friggin road" he bursts as he 
goes for
> another collision.
